column2: I will not be blackmailed
column3: Je ne vais point céder au chantage
column4: I will not be blackmailed
column6: I will not be blackmailed

column2:
Your shameful attempt at blackmail has not succeeded. No matter how many corrupted souls you have enticed to help carry out your plan I will not give in without a fight. I'd rather die defending what is rightfully mine!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column3:
Votre tentative de chantage honteulx n'a point réussi. Peu importe combien d'asmes corrompues vous ont aidé à réaliser votre stratagesme, je ne céderoi point sans combattre. Je préfère mourir en défendant ce qui est légitimement mien! 

Signé,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
Your shameful attempt at blackmail has not succeeded. No matter how many corrupted souls you have enticed to help carry out your plan I will not give in without a fight. I'd rather die defending what is rightfully mine!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Your shameful attempt at blackmail has not succeeded. No matter how many corrupted souls you have enticed to help carry out your plan I will not give in without a fight. I'd rather die defending what is rightfully mine!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2: Then it is war!
column3: Alors c'est la guerre !
column4: Then it is war!
column6: Then it is war!

column2: I guess I have no choice...
column3: Je suppose que je n'ai point le chois...
column4: I guess I have no choice...
column6: I guess I have no choice...

column2: On second thought...
column3: En y réfléchissant bien...
column4: On second thought...
column6: On second thought...

column2: Shed a tear for gallant Sir [From.GetFirstName].
column3: Verser une larme pour le galant Sire [From.GetFirstName].
column4: Shed a tear for gallant Sir [From.GetFirstName].
column6: Shed a tear for gallant Sir [From.GetFirstName].

column2: To arms!!
column3: Aulx armes !
column4: To arms!!
column6: To arms!!

column2: I don't mind.
column3: Ça m'est égal.
column4: Ich habe nichts dagegen.
column6: Me da lo mismo.

column2: Avoid [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]
column3: Eviter [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]
column4: Vermeide [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]
column6: Avoid [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]

column2: [From.GetSheHeCap]'s not my type
column3: [From.GetSheHeCap] n'est point mon genre
column4: [From.GetSheHeCap] ist nicht mein Typ
column6: [From.GetSheHeCap]'s not my type

column2: What took [From.GetHerHim] so long?
column3: Pourquoi a-t-[From.GetHerHim] tant tardé ?
column4: Warum hat [From.GetHerHim] so lange gebraucht?
column6: ¿Por qué ha tardado tanto?

column2: Dissuade [From.GetHerHim].
column3: Dissuadez-le.
column4: Es ihm ausreden
column6: Disuádele

column2: Kick [From.GetHerHim] out and tell everyone what happened!
column3: Refuser et dire à tous ce qui s'est passé!
column4: Verweigern und berichten!
column6: Negarse y decir a todos lo que pasó!

column2: I went to [From.GetFirstName]'s chamber and gave [From.GetHerHim] a good tumble!
column3: Je me suis introduit dans la chambre de [From.GetFirstName] et l'ai honorée !
column4: Ich ging zu [From.GetFirstName]'s Kammer und gab [From.GetHerHim] eine gute Nacht!
column6: I went to [From.GetFirstName]'s chamber and gave [From.GetHerHim] a good tumble!

column2: [From.GetFirstName] has spurned my subtle advances.
column3: [From.GetFirstName] a repoussé mes subtiles avances.
column4: [From.GetFirstName] hat meine subtilen Annäherungen verschmäht.
column6: [From.GetFirstName] ha rechazado mis sutiles insinuaciones.

column2: How could [From.GetSheHe] resist my charms?
column3: Comment pourroit-[From.GetSheHe] resister à mes charmes ?
column4: Wie konnte [From.GetSheHe] meinen Reizen widerstehen?
column6: How could [From.GetSheHe] resist my charms?

column2: [From.GetFirstName] was furious and made a public spectacle of the incident!
column3: [From.GetFirstName] a crié et fait des histoires devant mes gardes !
column4: [From.GetFirstName] kreischte und machte vor meinen eigenen Wachen eine Szene!
column6: ¡[From.GetFirstName] gritó y armó un escándalo ante mis propios guardias!

column2: Oops. How embarrassing!
column3: Comment embarrassant!
column4: Wie peinlich!
column6: ¡Qué vergüenza!

column2: Peasant rebels have taken control of one of our holdings in [From.GetName] and declared independence!
column3: Les croquants ont pris le controsle d'un de vos fiefs en [From.GetName] et ont déclaré leur indépendance !
column4: Bauerrebellen haben die Kontrolle über eines unserer Beteiligungen in [From.GetName] genommen und Unabhängigkeit erklärt!
column6: Peasant rebels have taken control of one of our holdings in [From.GetName] and declared independence!

column2: Praise the man for a fantastic feast!
column3: Louez votre hoste pour une feste fantastique !
column4: Praise the man for a fantastic feast!
column6: Praise the man for a fantastic feast!

column2: I don't really need to bloat his ego more.
column3: Je n'ai point vraiment besoin de faire enfler son égo.
column4: I don't really need to bloat his ego more.
column6: I don't really need to bloat his ego more.

column2: Not much left to do but enjoy it.
column3: Il n'y a plus grand chose à faire à part en profiter.
column4: Not much left to do but enjoy it.
column6: Not much left to do but enjoy it.

column2: Upholding the virtue of Charity means to bear wrongs patiently. There are some people who dislike me personally and wish me bad luck, but I forgive them.
column3: Faire preuve de charité signifie aussi de prendre sur soi. Il y a des gens qui m'abhorrent personnellement et souhaitent ma chute, mais je leur pardonne.
column4: Upholding the virtue of Charity means to bear wrongs patiently. There are some people who dislike me personally and wish me bad luck, but I forgive them.
column6: Upholding the virtue of Charity means to bear wrongs patiently. There are some people who dislike me personally and wish me bad luck, but I forgive them.

column2: I want to hear 'Steppenwolf'!
column3: Je veulx écouter 'Steppenwolf' !
column4: Ich will 'Steppenwolf' hören!
column6: I want to hear 'Steppenwolf'!

column2: This year's summer fair was a great success! The merchants and traders drawn to [Root.Capital.GetName] have revitalized the province's economy.
column3: La foire d'été de cette année a été un grand succès! Les marchands et commerçants venus à [Root.Capital.GetName] ont revitalisé l'économie de la province.
column4: Das diesjährige Sommerfest war ein voller Erfolg! Die Kaufleute und Händler zu [Root.Capital.GetName] haben die Wirtschaft der Provinz revitalisiert.
column6: This year's summer fair was a great success! The merchants and traders drawn to [Root.Capital.GetName] have revitalized the province's economy.

column2: Perhaps it is a miracle - my old injury is beginning to feel a little better.
column3: Peult-estre que c'est un miracle - mon ancienne blessure commence à aller un peu mieulx.
column4: Vielleicht ist es ein Wunder - meine alte Verletzung beginnt zu heilen und ich fühle mich ein wenig besser.
column6: Tal vez es un milagro - de mi vieja lesión está empezando a sentir un poco mejor.

column2: My wound has become infected and gangrenous. The surgeon says that the limb must be removed if I am to survive.
column3: Ma blessure a commencé à s'infecter et à se gangréner. Le chirugien dit que le membre doit estre amputé si je veulx survivre.
column4: Meine alte Wunde hat sich mit Wundbrand infiziert. Der Chirurg meint, dass er die Gliedmaße amputieren muss, wenn ich überleben will.
column6: My wound has become infected and gangrenous. The surgeon says that the limb must be removed if I am to survive.

column2: Argh, the pain!
column3: Mortecouille, quelle douleur !
column4: Argh, der Schmerz!
column6: Argh, the pain!

column2: The illness sent me into a deep sleep in which I spent days moaning and trashing about in my fevered delirium. When I woke, the fever had broken but the world had gone dark.
column3: La maladie m'a plongé dans un profond sommeil et j'ai passé des journées à gémir dans mon délire fiévreulx. Lorsque je me suis réveillé, la fièvre avoit disparu, mais le monde estoit devenu sombre.
column4: The illness sent me into a deep sleep in which I spent days moaning and trashing about in my fevered delirium. When I woke, the fever had broken but the world had gone dark.
column6: The illness sent me into a deep sleep in which I spent days moaning and trashing about in my fevered delirium. When I woke, the fever had broken but the world had gone dark.

column2: I cannot see!
column3: Je ne vois point !
column4: I cannot see!
column6: I cannot see!

column2: Reveal the truth to all that will listen.
column3: Reveal the truth to all that will listen.
column4: Reveal the truth to all that will listen.
column6: Reveal the truth to all that will listen.

column2: My friends have come up with a daring plan to break me out of prison. Do I dare to make the attempt?
column3: Mes amis sont venus avec un plan audacieulx pour me sortir de geosle. Oserois-je faire une tentative?
column4: Meine Freunde haben einen mutigen Plan ersonnen, mich aus dem Gefängnis zu befreien. Wage ich, den Versuch ?
column6: My friends have come up with a daring plan to break me out of prison. Do I dare to make the attempt?

column2: It's too risky
column3: C'est trop risqué.
column4: Es ist zu Riskant
column6: It's too risky

column2: Freedom is worth any risk
column3: La Liberté vault n'importe quel risque
column4: Freiheit ist jedes Risiko wert!
column6: Freedom is worth any risk

column3: Qu'on lui coupe sa teste!
column4: Ab mit [From.GetPossPronoun]em Kopf !
column6: Off with [From.GetPossPronoun] head!

column2: I deserve my freedom. I should offer to pay a ransom for my release.
column3: J'ai le droit à la liberté. Je devrois payer une rançon pour me faire relacher.
column4: I deserve my freedom. I should offer to pay a ransom for my release.
column6: I deserve my freedom. I should offer to pay a ransom for my release.

column3: Soumettre ma requeste
column4: Make my request
column6: Make my request

column4: My prisoner, [From.GetBestName], is offering to pay a ransom for [From.GetHerHis] freedom.
column6: My prisoner, [From.GetBestName], is offering to pay a ransom for [From.GetHerHis] freedom.

column4: Accept the ransom

column3: Qu'on [From.GetHerHim] laisse pourrir
column4: Let [From.GetHerHim] rot
column6: Let [From.GetHerHim] rot

column2: I have become strongly attached to the culture of [Root.Capital.GetName], dressing and speaking almost like a local.
column3: Je suis devenu extresmement attaché à la culture de [Root.Capital.GetName], je m'habille et parle presque comme un local.
column4: Ich habe mich stark der [Root.Capital.GetName]en Kultur angepasst. Fast schon wie ein Einheimischer.
column6: I have become strongly attached to the culture of [Root.Capital.GetName], dressing and speaking almost like a local.

column2: I feel like a [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName]
column3: Je me sens comme un [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName]
column4: Ich fühle mich wie ein [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName]er Mensch.
column6: I feel like a [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName]

column2: It is a passing fancy
column3: C'est une lubie
column4: Es ist eine vorübergehende Fantasie
column6: It is a passing fancy

column2: I have grown increasingly attached to [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], and though our marriage was merely a practical arrangement I wonder if I have now come to love [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim].
column3: Je suis de plus en plus attaché(e) à [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], et bien que nos épousailles n'aient été qu'un arrangement pratique, je me demande si je n'en suis point venu à l'aimer.
column4: Ich fühle mich immer mehr zu [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] hingezogen, und das obwohl unsere Ehre eher zweckmäßig war bisher. Ich frage mich ob ich Liebe gegenüber [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] empfinde.
column6: I have grown increasingly attached to [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], and though our marriage was merely a practical arrangement I wonder if I have now come to love [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim].

column2: This is a marriage of love
column3: C'est un mariage d'amour
column4: Das ist eine Ehe der Liebe
column6: This is a marriage of love

column2: But all the other girls!
column3: Mais toutes les aultres pucelles !
column4: Aber all die anderen Mädchen!
column6: But all the other girls!

column2: But all the other boys!
column3: Mais tous les aultres damelots !
column4: Aber all die anderen Jungen!
column6: But all the other boys!

column2: I am not ready to commit fully to [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]
column3: Je ne suis point prest à m'engager pleinement auprès de [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]
column4: Ich bin dazu nicht bereit mich völlig mit [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] zu binden.
column6: I am not ready to commit fully to [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]

column2: A Thieves' Guild has been established in [Root.GetName].
column3: Mon inaptitude pour lintendance a entraisné létablissement dune Guilde de voleurs à [Root.GetName].
column4: Aufgrund meiner etwas hapernden Verwaltungsfähigkeit hat sich in [Root.GetName] eine Diebesgilde eingerichtet.
column6: Debido a mi incapacidad administrativa se ha establecido una banda de ladrones en [Root.GetName].

column2: They have not stolen any of my property yet
column3: Ils nont encor dérobé nul de mes biens.
column4: Noch haben sie mir nichts gestohlen
column6: Aún no me han robado nada

column2: Thanks to my tireless efforts, the Thieves' Guild in [Root.GetName] has been eradicated.
column3: Grasce à mes compétences en matière dintendance, la Guilde de voleurs de [Root.GetName] a été éradiquée.
column4: Dank meiner klugen Verwaltung von [Root.GetName] wurde die hiesige Diebesgilde ausgerottet.
column6: Gracias a mi buena administración de [Root.GetName], la banda de ladrones ha sido eliminada.

column2: It is good to be the [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]!
column3: Cest bon destre le(la) [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] !
column4: Es ist gut, der [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] zu sein!
column6: ¡Es bueno ser el [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]!

column2: A Smugglers' Ring has formed in [Root.GetName].
column3: Mes piètres talents de diplomate ont permis à un Cercle de contrebandiers de se créer à [Root.GetName].
column4: Meine mangelnde Diplomatiefähigkeit hat in [Root.GetName] zum Aufkommen eines Schmugglerrings geführt.
column6: Debido a mi escasa diplomacia ha surgido una red de contrabandistas en [Root.GetName].

column2: I don't see how this matters to me?
column3: Je ne vois point en quoi cela me concerne.
column4: Und warum sollte mich das kümmern?
column6: No veo cómo me afecta esto a mí.

column2: Thanks to my tireless efforts, the Smugglers' Ring in [Root.GetName] has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike outside the city gates.
column3: Grasce à mes grandes compétences diplomatiques, le Cercle de contrebandiers de [Root.GetName] a été éradiqué. La teste du dernier contrebandier pourrit désormais au bout dune pique devant les portes de la cité.
column4: Dank meiner großartigen Diplomatiefähigkeit wurde der Schmugglerring in [Root.GetName] vernichtet. Der Kopf des letzten Schmugglers verrottet nun auf einem Spieß vor den Stadttoren.
column6: Gracias a mi habilidad diplomática, la red de contrabandistas de [Root.GetName] ha sido destruida. El jefe del último contrabandista se pudre ahora empalado en una pica fuera de la villa.

column2: I am such a great [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]
column3: Je suis un(e) grand(e) [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle].
column4: Ich bin als [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] so großartig!
column6: Soy un gran [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]

column2: Bands of robbers are roaming the countryside in [Root.GetName], killing and stealing. They are too craven to attack my castles though.
column3: À cause de mon manque de discernement dans le domaine martial, des bandes de voleurs sillonnent les campagnes de [Root.GetName]. Ils sont cependant trop lasches pour attaquer mes castels.
column4: Aufgrund meiner mittelmäßigen Fähigkeiten in der Kriegskunst ziehen nun in [Root.GetName] Räuberbanden umher. Zum Angriff auf meine Burgen sind sie aber zu feige.
column6: Debido a mis escasos conocimientos militares, bandas de ladrones vagan por los campos de [Root.GetName]. Aunque son demasiado cobardes para atacar mis castillos.

column2: I am safe inside my walls..
column3: Je suis en sécurité entre mes murs.
column4: Hinter meinen Mauern bin ich sicher.
column6: Estoy a salvo dentro de mis muros...

column2: I have rounded up and executed the robber bands that were plaguing [Root.GetName]!
column3: Grasce à mes grandes compétences martiales, jai fait arrester et exécuter les bandes de voleurs qui sévissoient à [Root.GetName] !
column4: Dank meiner großartigen Kriegskunstfähigkeit konnte ich die [Root.GetName] heimsuchenden Räuberbanden zusammentreiben und hinrichten!
column6: ¡Con mi gran habilidad militar he acorralado y ejecutado a las bandas de ladrones que plagaban [Root.GetName]!

column2: Call me [Root.County.Holder.GetTitledFirstName] the Great!
column3: Quon mappelle [Root.County.Holder.GetTitledFirstName] le(la) Grand(e) !
column4: Nennt mich Eure Herrlichkeit, [Root.County.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]!
column6: ¡Llamadme [Root.County.Holder.GetTitledFirstName] el Magno!

column2: I will watch from the stands
column3: I will watch from the stands
column4: I will watch from the stands
column6: I will watch from the stands

column2: I will not be attending
column3: I will not be attending
column4: I will not be attending
column6: I will not be attending

column2: I look forward to watching the jousts.
column3: I look forward to watching the jousts.
column4: I look forward to watching the jousts.
column6: I look forward to watching the jousts.

column2: I will fight in the tournament myself!
column3: I will fight in the tournament myself!
column4: I will fight in the tournament myself!
column6: I will fight in the tournament myself!

column2: The war has forced an unfortunate end to the tournament. We shall have to begin again once victory is achieved.
column3: The war has forced an unfortunate end to the tournament. We shall have to begin again once victory is achieved.
column4: The war has forced an unfortunate end to the tournament. We shall have to begin again once victory is achieved.
column6: The war has forced an unfortunate end to the tournament. We shall have to begin again once victory is achieved.

column2: Best not to annoy [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]
column3: Il seroit mieulx de ne point l'ennuyer
column4: Am besten [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] nicht ärgern
column6: Best not to annoy [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]

column2: War disrupts our summer fair. We are forced to cancel our activities.
column3: War disrupts our summer fair. We are forced to cancel our activities.
column4: War disrupts our summer fair. We are forced to cancel our activities.
column6: War disrupts our summer fair. We are forced to cancel our activities.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] believed me when I told [From.GetHerHim] I had never even talked to the girl who accused me of raping her.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] m'a cru lorsque j'ai dit [From.GetHerHim] je n'ai jamais parlé à la fille qui m'a accusé de l'avoir violé.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] glaubte mir als ich [From.GetHerHim] erzählte, das ich nie mit der Frau gesprochen habe, die mich der Vergewaltigung beschuldigt hat.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] believed me when I told [From.GetHerHim] I had never even talked to the girl who accused me of raping her.

column2: I fear that the long years of peace have made me complacent and decadent. Where once I would long for the sounds of battle and the glory of victory, I now prefer the comfortable, easy life of luxury in my palaces.
column3: Je crains que les longues années de paix ont fait de moi la complaisance et la décadence incarnée. Là où jadis je vivais pour la gloire et le feu des bastailles , je préfère maintenant la vie confortable de mes palais.
column4: Ich fürchte, dass die langen Jahre des Friedens haben mich selbstgefällig und dekaden gemachtt. Wo einst würde ich mich nach den Geräusche des Kampfes und der Ruhm des Sieges sehnen, habe ich jetzt lieber den bequemen, einfachen Leben von Luxus meiner Paläste.
column6: I fear that the long years of peace have made me complacent and decadent. Where once I would long for the sounds of battle and the glory of victory, I now prefer the comfortable, easy life of luxury in my palaces.

column2: Perhaps I should contemplate a new campaign?
column3: Peult-estre que je devrois envisager une nouvelle campagne ?
column4: Vielleicht sollte ich erwägen, eine neue Kampagne zu planen?
column6: Perhaps I should contemplate a new campaign?

column2: I am proud to have become a faqih!
column3: Je suis fier destre devenu un faqish !
column4: Ich bin stolz darauf, ein Faqih geworden zu sein!
column6: ¡Estoy orgulloso de ser un faquí!

column2: The Jewish Community that I am sheltering has prospered and grown under my benevolent rule.
column3: La communauté juive que je protège a grandi et prospéré sous mon règne bienveillant.
column4: Die Jüdische Gemeinde, die unter Eurem Schutz steht, hat sich entwickelt und wuchs unter Eurer wohlwollenden Herrschaft.
column6: The Jewish Community that I am sheltering has prospered and grown under my benevolent rule.

column2: Excellent
column3: Excellent
column4: Excellent
column6: Excellent

column2: My liege, I bring news from the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. The Jewish merchants that you wisely allowed to settle in the city have grown fat and prosperous under your benevolent rule, and you can expect increased revenue from the taxes and tariffs imposed on their community.
column3: Mon seigneur, je vous apporte des nouvelles de l'[From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Les marchands juifs que vous avez sagement autorisés à s'installer dans le bourg se sont developpés et prospèrent sous votre règne bienveillant. Vous pouvez vous attendre à une augmentation des revenus provenant des taxes et droits de douane imposés sur leur communauté.
column4: My liege, I bring news from the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. The Jewish merchants that you wisely allowed to settle in the city have grown fat and prosperous under your benevolent rule, and you can expect increased revenue from the taxes and tariffs imposed on their community.
column6: My liege, I bring news from the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. The Jewish merchants that you wisely allowed to settle in the city have grown fat and prosperous under your benevolent rule, and you can expect increased revenue from the taxes and tariffs imposed on their community.

column3: Excellent
column4: Exzellent
column6: Excellent

column2: A skilled advisor from the Jewish Community I am sheltering has made his services available to me.
column3: Un conseiller qualifié de la communauté juive que j'abrite, a mis ses services à ma disposition.
column4: Ein talentierter Berater aus der Jüdischen Gemeinde bietet Euch seine Dienste an.
column6: A skilled advisor from the Jewish Community I am sheltering has made his services available to me.

column2: A group of Jewish refugees from distant lands have come to my court. They are seeking a new a place to live after being expelled from their former homes and ask for my permission to establish a community in one of my cities.
column3: Un groupe de réfugiés juifs d'un pays lointain est venu à ma cour. Ils sont en queste d'un nouveau lieu de vie après avoir été expulsés de leurs anciens foyers et me demandent la permission d'établir une communauté dans un de mes bourgs.
column4: Eine Gruppe jüdischer Flüchtlinge aus fernen Landen kam an euren Hof. Sie sind auf der Suche nach einem neuen Ort zum Leben, nachdem sie aus ihrer Heimat vertrieben wurden. Nun bitten sie um Erlaubnis, sich in einer Eurer Städte niederzulassen und eine neue Gemeinde zu gründen.
column6: A group of Jewish refugees from distant lands have come to my court. They are seeking a new a place to live after being expelled from their former homes and ask for my permission to establish a community in one of my cities.

column2: They are welcome!

column2: Tell them to move on

column2: [From.GetTitledName] has decreed that all Jews in [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] are to be expelled from the realm and their assets seized by the crown. This includes my own Jewish subjects, who I have no choice but to banish unless I want to openly defy my liege.
column3: [From.GetTitledName] a décrété que tous les Juifs [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] devaient estre expulsés du royaume et leurs biens saisis par la couronne. Cela comprend mes propres sujets juifs, je n'ai point d'aultre chois que de les bannir à moins que je ne tienne à défier ouvertement mon suzerain.
column4: [From.GetTitledName] hat angeordnet, dass alle Juden aus [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] vertrieben werden sollen und ihr Besitz an die Krone fällt. Das betrifft auch Eure jüdischen Untertanen - und Ihr habt keine andere Wahl, falls Ihr nicht Euren eigenen Besitz verlieren wollt.

column2: Since I still don't have a male heir, I may need to consider the possibility of my realm passing to my daughter. Rulership is harder for a woman, but not impossible. If I were to start raising her as my heir now, she would be better prepared should she succeed me to the throne...
column3: Comme je n'ai toujours point d'héritier masculin, je pourrois envisager que ma fille hérite de mon royaume. Il est plus difficile pour une femme de régner, mais ce n'est point impossible. Si je commençois à l'élever comme mon héritière dès à présent, elle seroit mieulx préparée si elle devoit un jour me succéder au trosne...

column2: The citizens of Cyrenaica et Creta can rejoice, as Roman law is once more upheld in this barren land. Yet another ancient Roman province has been returned to the bosom of the mightiest empire the civilised world has ever seen. May it never suffer the cruel touch of barbarians again.
column3: Les citoyens de Cyrénaïque et de Crète peuvent se réjouir, comme la loi romaine est une fois de plus en vigueur dans ces terres arides. Une vieille province romaine de plus est retournée au sein du plus puissant empire que le monde civilisé ait jamais vu. Puisse-t-elle ne plus jamais souffrir aulx mains des barbares.

column2: At last the Great Schism between the Western Catholic Church and the Eastern Orthodox Church has been mended. With the spread of Catholicism and the reunification of the Pentarchy, including the vital episcopal see of Constantinople, the Orthodox faith now holds little sway over the people of Europe. There will be those who still cling to it, but they will be few in number and the Pentarchy can once more claim universal rule over all of Christendom.
column3: Enfin le Grand Schisme entre l'Église catholique d'Occident et l'Église orthodoxe d'Orient est terminé. Avec l'expansion de l'orthodoxie et la réunification de la Pentarchie, incluant l'important siège épiscopal de Rome, la foi catholique n'a plus la mesme
column4: Endlich wurde das Große Schisma zwischen der westlichen katholischen Kirche und der östlichen orthodoxen Kirche geheilt. Mit der Ausbreitung der Rechtgläubigkeit und der Wiedervereinigung der Pentarchie, unter Einbindung aller fünf Episkopale Roms, hat de
column6: Por fin, el Gran Cisma entre la Iglesia Católica Occidental y la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental ha sido reparado. Con la expansión de la Ortodoxia y la reunificación de la Pentarquía, incluida la vital sede episcopal de Roma, la fe católica tiene ahora poca influencia sobre la gente en Europa. Habrá quienes todavía se aferren a ella, pero serán pocos en número y la  Pentarquía puede reclamar una vez más, el dominio universal sobre toda la cristiandad.

column2: With the city now under Catholic control, the Patriarchate of Antioch has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Western Catholic Church. It was originally founded by Saint Peter the Apostle, who is regarded as the first Pope by the Western Catholic Church.

column4: Nun da die Stadt erneut unter der Kontrolle Ost-Roms ist, wurde das Patriarchat von Antiochien, als einer der bischöflichen Arme der Pentarchie in der Orthodoxen Kirche des Ostens, wiederhergestellt. Es wurde ursprünglich vom Heiligen Apostel Petrus gegrü
column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Antioquía ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental. La cual fue originalmente fundada por San Pedro Apóstol, considerado el primer Papa de la Iglesia católica occidental.

column2: With the city now under Catholic control, the Patriarchate of Jerusalem has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Western Catholic Church. It was originally founded by Saint James the Just, who was made head of the Church in Jerusalem soon after the death of Jesus.
column3: Comme la cité est de nouveau sous le controsle de l'Empire Romain d'Orient, le Patriarcat de Jérusalem a formellement été restitué à l'un des sièges épiscopaulx de la Pentarchie au sein de l'Église orthodoxe orientale. Il a été fondé à l'origine par Saint J
column4: Nun da die Stadt erneut unter der Kontrolle Ost-Roms ist, wurde das Patriarchat von Jerusalem, als einer der bischöflichen Arme der Pentarchie in der Orthodoxen Kirche des Ostens, wiederhergestellt. Es wurde ursprünglich vom Heiligen Jakobus, dem Gerechte
column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Jerusalén ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental, la cual fue originalmente fundada por Santiago el Justo, que fue nombrado jefe de la Iglesia en Jerusalén poco después de la  muerte de Jesús.

column2: With the city now under Catholic control, the Patriarchate of Alexandria has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Western Catholic Church. It was originally founded by Saint Mark the Evangelist, who became Alexandria's first patriarch.
column3: Comme la cité est de nouveau sous le controsle de l'Empire Romain d'Orient, le Patriarcat d'Alexandrie a formellement été restitué à l'un des sièges épiscopaulx de la Pentarchie au sein de l'Église orthodoxe orientale. Il a été fondé à l'origine par Saint M
column4: Nun da die Stadt erneut unter der Kontrolle Ost-Roms ist, wurde das Patriarchat von Alexandrien, als einer der bischöflichen Arme der Pentarchie in der Orthodoxen Kirche des Ostens, wiederhergestellt. Es wurde ursprünglich vom Heiligen Evangelist Markus g
column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Alejandría ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental, que originalmente fue fundada por San Marcos Evangelista, el primer patriarca de Alejandría.

column2: At last the Great Schism between the Western Catholic Church and the Eastern Orthodox Church has been mended, but not by either of the expected sides, but rather the Coptic church has proven to be the savior of Christendom. With the spread of the Coptic faith and the reunification of the Pentarchy, including the vital episcopal see of Constantinople, the other Christian faiths now holds little sway over the people of Europe. There will be those who still cling to it, but they will be few in number and the Pentarchy can once more claim universal rule over all of Christendom.
column3: Enfin, le Grand Schisme entre l'Eglise Catholique Occidentale et l'Eglise Orthodoxe Orientale a pris fin, mais non point grasce à l'un des camps aulxquels on pouvoit s'attendre, mais plutost grasce à l'Eglise Copte qui s'est révélée estre le sauveur de la Chrétienté. Avec la diffusion de la foi copte et la réunification de la Pentarchie, incluant le capital évesché épiscopal de Constantinople, les aultres fois chrétiennes n'ont plus guère d'influence désormais sur les peuples d'Europe. Il y en aura qui s'y accrocheront, mais ils seront peu nombreulx et la Pentarchie peult une fois de plus proclamer son règne universel sur toute la Chrétienté.
column4: At last the Great Schism between the Western Catholic Church and the Eastern Orthodox Church has been mended, but not by the either of the expected sides, but rather the Coptic church has proven to be the savior of Christendom. There will be those who still cling to it, but they will be few in number and the Pentarchy can once more claim universal rule over all of Christendom.

Si los cinco patriarcados históricos son devueltos a la Pentarquía, el Gran Cisma entre las iglesias orientales y occidentales finalmente podrá ser reparado.

column2: The Province of Sicilia
column3: La Province de Sicile
column4: The Province of Sicilia
column6: The Province of Sicilia

column2: Imperial rule over Sicilia, one of the last western outposts of the Empire to be lost to barbarian rule, has been reinstated yet again - this time hopefully for good.
column3: La loi impériale a été rétablie en Sicile, un des derniers avant-postes de l'Empire à estre tombé devant les barbares à l'occident - cette fois-ci pour de bon, espérons-le.
column4: Imperial rule over Sicilia, one of the last western outposts of the Empire to be lost to barbarian rule, has been reinstated yet again - this time hopefully for good.
column6: Imperial rule over Sicilia, one of the last western outposts of the Empire to be lost to barbarian rule, has been reinstated yet again - this time hopefully for good.

column2: The Province of Corsica et Sardinia
column3: La Province de Corse et de Sardaigne
column4: The Province of Corsica et Sardinia
column6: The Province of Corsica et Sardinia

column2: The islands of Corsica and Sardinia, originally incorporated in the empire after the First Punic War, are yet again under imperial rule. The conquest of this strategic location in the Mediterranian heralds a glorious westward expansion of the Empire.
column3: Les isles de Corse et de Sardaigne, intégrées à l'origine à l'empire après la première Guerre Punique, sont de nouveau sous controsle impérial. La conqueste de ces points stratégiques dans la Méditerranée annonce une glorieuse expansion occidentale de l'Empire.
column4: The islands of Corsica and Sardinia, originally incorporated in the empire after the First Punic War, are yet again under imperial rule. The conquest of this strategic location in the Mediterranian heralds a glorious westward expansion of the Empire.
column6: The islands of Corsica and Sardinia, originally incorporated in the empire after the First Punic War, are yet again under imperial rule. The conquest of this strategic location in the Mediterranian heralds a glorious westward expansion of the Empire.

column2: The Province of Viennensis
column3: La Province de Viennensis
column4: The Province of Viennensis
column6: The Province of Viennensis

column2: Viennensis, named after the town Vienne in southeastern Gaul, has long been lost to Roman rule, but has now been incorporated back into the Empire. It was originally formed as a merger of the provinces Gallia Aquitania and Gallia Narbonensis created by Caesar after his campaigns had expanded the old province of Gaul too far to be administered as a single province.
column3: Viennensis, qui doit son nom au bourg de Vienne en Gaule du sud-est, et perdue il y a fort longtemps par Rome, a été réintégrée à l'Empire. Elle avoit été constituée à l'origine d'une fusion entre les provinces Gallia Aquitania et Gallia Narbonensis, créées par César après que ses campagnes aient étendu la vieille province de la Gaule trop loin pour estre administrée comme une province unique.
column4: Viennensis, named after the town Vienne in southeastern Gaul, has long been lost to Roman rule, but has now been incorporated back into the Empire. It was originally formed as a merger of the provinces Gallia Aquitania and Gallia Narbonensis created by Caesar after his campaigns had expanded the old province of Gaul too far to be administered as a single province.
column6: Viennensis, named after the town Vienne in southeastern Gaul, has long been lost to Roman rule, but has now been incorporated back into the Empire. It was originally formed as a merger of the provinces Gallia Aquitania and Gallia Narbonensis created by Caesar after his campaigns had expanded the old province of Gaul too far to be administered as a single province.

column2: I have decided to pardon [From.GetTitledName] of all [From.GetHerHis] crimes.
column3: J'ai décidé de pardonner toutes ses félonies à [From.GetTitledName]
column4: I have decided to pardon [From.GetTitledName] of all [From.GetHerHis] crimes.
column6: I have decided to pardon [From.GetTitledName] of all [From.GetHerHis] crimes.

column2: Mercy is a virtue
column3: La pitié est une vertu
column4: Mercy is a virtue
column6: Mercy is a virtue

column2: Eh, never mind
column3: Eh, peu importe
column4: Eh, never mind
column6: Eh, never mind

column2: I have decided to grant estates and land to [From.GetFullName], but how much land will [From.GetSheHe] receive?
column3: J'ai décidé de concéder des domaines et des terres à [From.GetFullName], mais combien de titres va-t-[From.GetSheHe] recevoir ?
column4: Ich habe mich dazu beschlossen, Ländereien und Grundstücke an [From.GetFullName] zu gewähren, aber wie viel Land wird [From.GetSheHe] erhalten?
column6: I have decided to grant estates and land to [From.GetFullName], but how much land will [From.GetSheHe] receive?

column2: A minor estate
column3: Un domaine modeste
column4: Einen kleinen Anwesen
column6: A minor estate

column2: A moderate estate
column3: Un domaine moyen
column4: Einen mäßigen Anwesen
column6: A moderate estate

column2: A large estate
column3: Un grand domaine
column4: Einen großen Anwesen
column6: A large estate

column2: None at all!
column3: Rien du tout!
column4: Überhaupt nichts!
column6: None at all!

column2: Today, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] asked me for landed estates to live off...
column3: Aujourd'hui, mon [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] m'a demandé la permission de quitter de castel familial et souhaiteroit que je lui accorde un domaine...
column4: Heute hat mein [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] mich dazu gebittet [From.GetHerHim] Grundbesitz zu geben um davon zu Leben...
column6: Today, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] asked me for landed estates to live off...

column2: I gave [From.GetHerHim] what [From.GetSheHe] wanted
column3: Je lui ai donné ce qu'[From.GetSheHe] vouloit
column4: Ich gabe [From.GetHerHim] was [From.GetSheHe] wollte
column6: I gave [From.GetHerHim] what [From.GetSheHe] wanted

column2: I told [From.GetHerHim] I could not afford it...
column3: Je lui ai dit que je ne pouvois point me le permettre...
column4: Ich sagte [From.GetHerHim] das ich es nicht gewähren könnte...
column6: I told [From.GetHerHim] I could not afford it...

column2: I have arranged for the sale of my old estates so that I can concentrate my wealth to the lands that I now hold.
column3: Je me suis arrangé pour vendre mes anciens domaines afin que je puisse consacrer ma richesse aulx terres que je détiens.
column4: Ich habe den Verkauf meinen alten Anwesen angeordnet, so dass ich meinen Reichtum zu den Ländern, die ich jetzt halte, zusammen sammeln kann.
column6: I have arranged for the sale of my old estates so that I can concentrate my wealth to the lands that I now hold.

column2: An opportunity has arisen to attempt the kidnapping of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. My fellow plotters are just waiting for my signal to proceed.
column3: Une occasion s'est présentée de tenter l'enlèvement de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Mes collègues conspirateurs n'attendent que mon signal pour commencer.
column4: Eine Gelegenheit ist entstanden, um die Entführung von [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] zu versuchen. Meine Verschwörer warten nur auf mein Signal, um fortzufahren.
column6: An opportunity has arisen to attempt the kidnapping of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. My fellow plotters are just waiting for my signal to proceed.

column2: We strike after dark!
column3: Nous frapperons à la nuit tombée !
column4: Wir gehen nach Einbruch der Dunkelheit!
column6: We strike after dark!

column2: Wait for a better opportunity...
column3: Attendre une meilleure opportunité ...
column4: Warte auf eine bessere Gelegenheit
column6: Wait for a better opportunity...

column2: As I was sleeping, [From.GetTitledFirstName] broke into my bedchamber and put a dagger to my throat. I was forced out into the courtyard, where [From.GetHerHis] co-conspirators were waiting on fast horses. [From.GetTitledFirstName] now has me locked up in the basement of [From.GetHerHis] manor and is demanding that I give [From.GetHerHim] the land [From.GetSheHe] considers rightfully [From.GetHerHis]. If I refuse, [From.GetSheHe] is threatening to kill me...
column3: Alors que je dormois, [From.GetTitledFirstName] a pénétré dans ma chambre et m'a mis une dague sous le gosier. J'ai été conduit jusque dans la cour, où ses co-conspirateurs attendoient sur des montures fraisches. [From.GetTitledFirstName] m'a désormais enfermé au sous-sol de son castel et m'a demandé de lui donner la terre qu'[From.GetSheHe] considère comme son droit légitime. Si je refuse, [From.GetSheHe] m'a menacé de m'occire...
column4: Während ich schlief, brach [From.GetTitledFirstName] in meine Kammer ein und setze mir einen Dolch an die Kehle. Ich wurde in den Innenhof gebracht wo bereits [From.GetHerHis]e Mitverschwörer mit schnellen Pferden warteten. [From.GetTitledFirstName] kerkerte mich im Verlies von [From.GetHerHis] ein und verlangte, dass ich [From.GetHerHim] die Ländereien von [From.GetHerHim] an [From.GetSheHe] übergebe, die rechtmäßig [From.GetHerHis] gehören. Wenn ich mich weigere, droht [From.GetSheHe], mich zu töten.
column6: As I was sleeping, [From.GetTitledFirstName] broke into my bedchamber and put a dagger to my throat. I was forced out into the courtyard, where [From.GetHerHis] co-conspirators were waiting on fast horses. [From.GetTitledFirstName] now has me locked up in the basement of [From.GetHerHis] manor and is demanding that I give [From.GetHerHim] the land [From.GetSheHe] considers rightfully [From.GetHerHis]. If I refuse, [From.GetSheHe] is threatening to kill me...

column2: Take the land, just don't kill me!
column3: Prenez ces terres, mais ne me tuez point !
column4: Nim mein Land , aber töte mich nicht !
column6: Take the land, just don't kill me!

column2: I do not give in to threats
column3: Je ne cède point aulx menaces
column4: Ich gebe Drohungen nicht nach
column6: I do not give in to threats

column2: My guards caught [From.GetTitledFirstName] just as [From.GetSheHe] was about to break into my bedchamber, dagger in hand. Under interrogation, [From.GetSheHe] has confessed to planning to kidnap me to force me to give [From.GetHerHim] lands and a title.
column3: Mes gardent ont attrapé [From.GetTitledFirstName] juste au moment où [From.GetSheHe] allait pénétrer dans ma chambre, dague à la main. Sous la question,[From.GetSheHe] a confessé son projet de m'enlever pour me forcer à lui donner des terres et un titre.
column4: Meine Wachen schnappten [From.GetTitledFirstName] gerade als [From.GetSheHe]  versuchte in meine Gemächer einzudringen. Mit einem Dolch in der Hand !. Im Verhör gstand  [From.GetSheHe] das er plante mich zu kidnapen um mich zu zwingen Ländereien und Titel an [From.GetHerHim] zu geben.
column6: My guards caught [From.GetTitledFirstName] just as [From.GetSheHe] was about to break into my bedchamber, dagger in hand. Under interrogation, [From.GetSheHe] has confessed to planning to kidnap me to force me to give [From.GetHerHim] lands and a title.

column2: Let [From.GetHerHim] rot in jail
column3: Laissez [From.GetHerHim] pourrir dans les geosles
column4: Laßt [From.GetHerHim] im Kerker verrecken!
column6: Let [From.GetHerHim] rot in jail

column2: The punishment for treason is death!
column3: Le chastiment pour trahison est la mort !
column4: Die Strafe für den Verrat ist Tod!
column6: The punishment for treason is death!

column2: I will forgive [From.GetHerHim]... this time.
column3: Je vais lui pardonner... Pour cette fois.
column4: Ich vergebe [From.GetHerHim]... Diesmal!
column6: I will forgive [From.GetHerHim]... this time.

column2: My co-conspirators send word that they have prepared everything we need to discredit [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Documents of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] corruption have been prepared, and courtiers have been bribed to whisper to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]'s incompetence. With [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] reputation in tatters, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will find it impossible to hold on to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] position on the council.
column3: Mes co-conspirateurs m'ont prévenu qu'ils ont préparé tout ce qu'il faut pour discréditer [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Les documents compromettant ont été préparés, et les courtisans ont été soudoyés répandre des rumeurs à la cour de [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. Une fois sa réputation en lambeaulx, il ne lui sera plus possible de conserver son poste à la cour
column4: Meine Mitverschwörer senden wort, dass sie alles das wir brauchen, um [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] zu diskreditieren haben. Dokumente um [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] Korruption dar zu legen wurden hergestellt und Höflinge wurden bestochen an [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] zu flüstern von [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]'s Inkompetenz . Mit [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] Ruf in Fetzen, wird [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] es unmöglich finden um [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] Position auf dem Konzil zu halten.
column6: My co-conspirators send word that they have prepared everything we need to discredit [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Documents of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] corruption have been prepared, and courtiers have been bribed to whisper to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]'s incompetence. With [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] reputation in tatters, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will find it impossible to hold on to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] position on the council.

column2: That position will be mine!
column3: Ce poste sera mien !
column4: Der Position wird mir gehören!
column6: That position will be mine!

column2: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Rumors of incompetence and corruption have undermined the authority of my position, and it seems that even [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] have come to believe them as I have been removed from my position at the council.
column3: Je me suis trouvé la cible d'une violente campagne de diffamation à la cour. Les rumeurs d'incompétence et de corruption ont miné ma réputation, et il semble que mesme le/la [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] en est venu à les croire que j'ai été démis de mes fonctions au conseil.
column4: Ich bin das Ziel einer bösartigen Verleumdungskampagne bei Hof. Gerüchte von Inkompetenz und Korruption haben die Autorität meiner Position untergraben, und es scheint, dass auch [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] an die Entscheidung gekommen, sie zu glauben, als ich von meiner Position auf dem Konzil entfernt wurden.
column6: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Rumors of incompetence and corruption have undermined the authority of my position, and it seems that even [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] have come to believe them as I have been removed from my position at the council.

column2: I am ruined!
column3: Je suis ruiné!
column4: Ich bin ruiniert!
column6: I am ruined!

column2: The attempt to discredit [From.GetTitledFirstName] was a success! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has dismissed [From.GetHerHim] from the council and [From.GetHerHis] position is now vacant and ready for me to occupy.
column3: La tentative pour discréditer [From.GetTitledFirstName] a été un succès! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] l'a renvoyé du conseil, son poste est maintenant libre et prest pour mon investiture.
column4: Der Versuch, [From.GetTitledFirstName] zu diskreditieren war erfolgreich! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] hat [From.GetHerHim] aus dem Rat abgewiesen und [From.GetHerHis] Position ist jetzt frei und bereit für mich zu besetzen.
column6: The attempt to discredit [From.GetTitledFirstName] was a success! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has dismissed [From.GetHerHim] from the council and [From.GetHerHis] position is now vacant and ready for me to occupy.

column2: Excellent!
column3: Excellent
column4: Gut!
column6: Excellent!

column2: Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. I refused to believe it at first, but in the end I could not deny the weight of the evidence and was forced to remove [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] position at court.
column3: Dernièrement, j'ai ouï des rumeurs quant à l'incompétence de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. La nuit sous ma porte, quelqu'un a glissé des documents prouvant son implication dans des affaires de corruption. J'ai refusé d'y croire au premier abord, mais finalement je ne pouvais nier l'évidence et j'ai été contraint de retirer à [From.GetTitledFirstName] son poste à la cour.
column4: In letzter Zeit scheint es, dass ich nichts hörte, außer schlechtes von [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Von Flüstern der Inkompetenz am Hof, zur Dokumente von [From.GetHerHis] Korruption von die unter meiner Schlafzimmertür eines Nachtes geschlüpft wurde. Ich weigerte mich, es zuerst zu glauben, aber am Ende konnte ich es nicht leugnen. Das Gewicht der Beweismittel zwang mich [From.GetTitledFirstName] aus [From.GetHerHis] Stellung beim Hof zu entfernen.
column6: Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. I refused to believe it at first, but in the end I could not deny the weight of the evidence and was forced to remove [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] position at court.

column2: It had to be done
column3: Il falloit le faire
column4: Es musste getan werden.
column6: It had to be done

column2: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Whispers of incompetence and accusations of corruption have been directed at me, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have refused to give them credence and ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Although the investigation turned up nothing, my position at court is secure.
column3: Je me suis trouvé la cible d'une violente campagne de diffamation à la cour. Des rumeurs d'incompétence et des accusations de corruption ont été dirigées contre moi, mais heureusement [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] à refusé de leur donner créance et a ordonné une enqueste sur la source de ces rumeurs. Bien que l'enqueste n'a rien donné, ma position à la cour est sécurisée.
column4: Ich habe mich das Ziel einer bösartigen Verleumdungskampagne beim Hof gefunden. Flüstern der Inkompetenz und vorwürfe der Korruptions sind mir angerichtet. Glücklicherweiser hat [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] sich geweigert die Glaubwürdigkeit diese vorwürfe  zu würdigen und dazu geordnet eine Untersuchung der Quelle diese Gerüchte. Obwohl die Untersuchung nichts tauchte ist meine Position beim Hof sicher.
column6: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Whispers of incompetence and accusations of corruption have been directed at me, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have refused to give them credence and ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Although the investigation turned up nothing, my position at court is secure.

column2: Who could have instigated such an underhanded scheme?
column3: Qui auroit pu tenter quelque chose d'aussi sournois ?
column4: Who could have instigated such an underhanded scheme?
column6: Who could have instigated such an underhanded scheme?

column2: Despite the rumors and accusations directed at [From.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] refused to dismiss [From.GetHerHim] from the council and has ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Fortunately, the investigation turned up no evidence of my involvement.
column3: Malgré les rumeurs et accusations dirigées contre [From.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] a refusé de le renvoyer du conseil et a ordonné une enqueste sur la source de ces rumeurs. Heureusement, l'enqueste n'a mis à jour nulle preuve de mon implication.

column2: Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. I refused to believe the accusations, and ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. A thorough questioning of the court turned up nothing, but has at least put a stop to the slanderous accusations.
column3: Dernièrement, j'ai ouï des rumeurs quant à l'incompétence de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. La nuit sous ma porte, quelqu'un a glissé des documents prouvant son implication dans des affaires de corruption. J'ai refusé de croire ces accusations et ordonné une enqueste sur la source de ces rumeurs. L'interrogatoire n'a rien donné, mais cela a au moins mis un terme aulx accusations calomnieuses.

column2: The tithes and taxes for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] are on their way to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] castle and my co-conspirators have bribed the guards not to notice if a chest or two should go 'missing'. Everything is ready for the robbery to proceed.
column3: Le convoi transportant la dixme et les taxes collectées pour [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] est sur le chemin du castel. Mes co-conspirateurs ont soudoyé les gardes afin qu'ils ne remarquent point l'éventuelle disparition d'un coffre ou deulx, tout est prest pour effectuer le vol.
column4: The tithes and taxes for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] are on their way to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] castle and my co-conspirators have bribed the guards not to notice if a chest or two should go 'missing'. Everything is ready for the robbery to proceed.

column2: We'll all be rich!
column3: A nous la richesse !
column4: We'll all be rich!
column6: We'll all be rich!

column2: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today and were placed in the treasury. As I was inspecting the chests full of gold, it struck me that there seemed to be fewer of them than what had arrived earlier. A quick check of the treasurer's accounts revealed my worst fears...
column3: Le convoi transportant les imposts et la dixme collectés est arrivé au castel aujourd'hui et les coffres ont été placés dans le trésor. Lorsque nous avons inspecté la livraison, il m'a semblé qu'il en manquait par rapport à la précédente perception. Une vérification rapide des comptes du trésorier a confirmé mes craintes...
column4: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today and were placed in the treasury. As I was inspecting the chests full of gold, it struck me that there seemed to be fewer of them than what had arrived earlier. A quick check of the treasurer's accounts revealed my worst fears...

column2: I have been robbed!
column3: On m'a volé !
column4: I have been robbed!
column6: I have been robbed!

column2: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, several large chests full of gold made their way onto the back of a wagon which left the castle unnoticed. The gold is now safely locked away in my treasury and my co-conspirators have all received their share.
column3: Les taxes ont été transportées dans le trésor, plusieurs grands coffres pleins d'or ont fait leur chemin à l'arrière d'un wagon et ont quitté le castel inaperçu. L'or est désormais en toute sécurité et mes co-conspirateurs ont tous reçu leur part.
column4: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, several large chests full of gold made their way onto the back of a wagon which left the castle unnoticed. The gold is now safely locked away in my treasury and my co-conspirators have all received their share.

column2: Everything went as planned!
column3: Tout s'est passé comme prévu !
column4: Everything went as planned!
column6: Everything went as planned!

column2: I have received my share of the money embezzled by [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column3: J'ai reçu ma part de l'argent de [From.GetTitledFirstName] détourné par  [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column4: I have received my share of the money embezzled by [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column6: I have received my share of the money embezzled by [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].

column2: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today. As I was watching the money being carried into the treasury, I noticed some shadowy figures trying to make off with several chests full of gold. I had my guards seize them, and under questioning they revealed themselves to be in the employ of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. What shall be done with my thieving vassal?
column3: Le convoi transportant la dixme et les taxes collectées arriva au castel aujourd'hui. Alors que je surveillois le transfert, j'ai remarqué quelques silhouettes qui tentoient de faire main basse sur plusieurs coffres pleins d'or. Je les ai mis sur-le-champ aulx fers et pendant l'interrogatoire, ils ont révélé estre à la solde de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Que faire de ce vassal sournois ?
column4: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today. column4: Off with [From.GetHerHis] head!

column2: Forgive [From.GetHerHim]

column4: Forgive [From.GetHerHim]
column6: Forgive [From.GetHerHim]

column2: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, my men tried to make off with several chests of gold but were spotted by [From.GetTitledFirstName], who had come out to inspect the process [From.GetHerHim]self. Under questioning they revealed to myself to be in my employ, and now [From.GetTitledFirstName] knows that I attempted to rob [From.GetHerHim].
column3: Le convoi transportant la dixme et les taxes collectées arriva au castel aujourd'hui. Mes hommes ont tenté de faire main basse sur plusieurs coffres d'or, mais ont été repérés par [From.GetTitledFirstName], qui estoit sorti pour inspecter le processus . Ils ont été arresté, et pendant l'interrogatoire ils ont révélé estre à mon service et maintenant [From.GetTitledFirstName] sait que j'ai essayé de [From.GetHerHim] voler.

column2: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is planning a revolt against [Root.PlotTarget.Liege.GetHerHis] liege. The evidence will discreetly find its way into the hands of [Root.PlotTarget.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], who cannot fail to act on it.
column3: Mes co-conspirateurs ont fabriqué des preuves que [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] prévoit une révolte contre son seigneur [Root.PlotTarget.Liege.GetHerHis]. La preuve fera discrètement son chemin dans les mains de [Root.PlotTarget.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], qui devroit réagir.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to have me arrested for treason by slipping fabricated 'evidence' under [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s bedroom door, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] caught [From.GetHerHis] agent in the act and now it is [From.GetTitledFirstName] that stands accused of treason.

column2: As I was getting ready to sleep, I heard a scuffle from outside my bedroom door. Rushing outside, I found that my guards had seized a cloaked man as he was attempting to slip some documents into the room. Under questioning, he revealed that he was working for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and that the documents were fabricated evidence intended to turn me against my vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName].
column3: Comme je m'apprestois à dormir, j'ai ouï une bagarre derrière la porte de ma chambre. Me précipitant à l'extérieur l'arme a la main, j'ai constaté que mes gardes avoient saisi un homme masqué alors qu'il tentoit de glisser des documents dans ma chambre. En réponse aulx questions, il a révélé qu'il travailloit pour [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] et que les documents ont été fabriqués dans l'intention de semer la discorde entre mon vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName] et moi.
column4: As I was getting ready to sleep, I heard a scuffle from outside my bedroom door. Rushing outside, I found that my guards had seized a cloaked man as he was attempting to slip some documents into the room. Under questioning, he revealed that he was working for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and that the documents were fabricated evidence intended to turn me against my vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName].
column6: As I was getting ready to sleep, I heard a scuffle from outside my bedroom door. column2: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is planning a revolt against me. I will circulate the evidence among my vassals so that they will support my actions against the 'traitor'.
column3: Mes co-conspirateurs ont fabriqué des preuves que [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] prépare une révolte contre moi. Je vais faire circuler les éléments de preuve parmi mes vassaulx pour qu'ils appuient mes actions contre ce «traistre».

column2: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. Though the evidence is obviously a forgery, it seems almost everyone in the realm has been fooled by it, and I fear I am about to be arrested.
column3: Des documents compromettant m'accusant de traistrise contre [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] ont circulé à travers le royaume. Bien que ces preuves soient fabriquées, il semble que cela été dupé presque tout le monde dans le royaume, et je crains que le jour de mon arrestation approche.

column2: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. One of the forger's agents was caught while handing out the forgeries on my lands, and questioning revealed him to be working for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].

column2: Our soon-to-be-kidnappee will soon leave their well-guarded castle on a carriage ride with few guards along a windy forest road.  The perfect place for an ambush!

column2: As your carriage travels the windy forest road, you're ambushed by highwaymen!  They slaughter your guards, chain you, and deliver you to [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3: Alors que votre charriot voyage le long de la route venteuse à travers la forest, vous tombez dans une embuscade tendue par des bandits de grand chemin ! Ils massacrent vos gardes, vous enchaisnent, et vous remettent à [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column4: As your carriage travels the windy forest road, you're ambushed by highwaymen!  They slaughter your guards, chain you, and deliver you to [From.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: And I, I took the road less traveled by.  And has made all the difference...

column4: And I, I took the road less traveled by.  And has made all the difference...

column2: As your carriage travels through the forest, you doze off into a peaceful sleep.  You awaken to find that you've safely arrived at your destination, but it seems a gang of bandits and highwaymen have been active on another road in that forest this very day
column3: Tandis que votre charriot voyage à travers la forest, vous vous assoupissez dans un paisible sommeil. Vous vous réveillez pour vous retrouver sain et sauf à votre destination, mais il semble qu'une bande de coupe-jarrets et de bandits de grand chemin se soient montrés sur une aultre route dans la forest ce mesme jour

column2: As your carriage travels the windy forest road, you're ambushed by highwaymen!  Fortunately, your guards are well-trained and quickly dispatch them.  As one lays dying, he admits he was sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName] to kidnap you.
column3: Alors que votre charriot voyage le long de la route venteuse à travers la forest, vous tombez dans une embuscade tendue par des bandits de grand chemin ! Heureusement, vos gardes sont bien entraisnés et se débarrassent d'eulx. Alors que l'un d'entre eulx gist agonisant, il admet avoir été envoyé par [From.GetTitledFirstName] pour vous enlever.

column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] a réussi à infiltrer un homme dans la garde personnelle de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Nous avons à présent une bonne opportunité de l'atteindre et de l'enlever pendant son sommeil.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to get a man inside [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s guard.  We now have a fine opening to break in and steal him away while he sleeps.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to get a man inside [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s guard.  We now have a fine opening to break in and steal him away while he sleeps.

column2: Do I at least get a pillow?
column3: Puis-je au moins avoir un oreiller ?
column4: Do I at least get a pillow?
column6: Do I at least get a pillow?

column2: In the dead of night, you're suddenly awoken with three sword points in your face.  Bound and gagged, you're thrown in a carriage and taken to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison.  Your new stone bed is considerably less comfortable than your feather bed at home.
column3: Au milieu de la nuitée, vous estes soudainement réveillé par trois épées pointées sur votre visage. Ligoté et basillonné, vous estes balancé sur un charriot et emmené dans les geosles de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Votre nouvelle couche de pierre est considérablement moins confortable que la couche de plumes de votre logis.
column4: In the dead of night, you're suddenly awoken with three sword points in your face.  Bound and gagged, you're thrown in a carriage and taken to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison.  Your new stone bed is considerably less comfortable than your feather bed at home.
column6: In the dead of night, you're suddenly awoken with three sword points in your face.  Bound and gagged, you're thrown in a carriage and taken to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison.  Your new stone bed is considerably less comfortable than your feather bed at home.

column2: We'll need a few more guards
column3: On va avoir besoin de quelques gardes de plus
column4: We'll need a few more guards
column6: We'll need a few more guards

column2: You're awakened in the night to the sounds of a scuffle  it appears some unknown infiltrators had the audacity to try to break into your chambers.  Why they came or what they wanted is a secret they took to the grave.
column3: Vous estes réveillé dans la nuitée par le son d'une bagarre - il semble que des infiltrés inconnus ont eu l'audace d'essayer de s'introduire dans vos quartiers. La raison de leur intrusion est un secret qu'ils emportent avec eulx dans leur trépas.
column4: You're awakened in the night to the sounds of a scuffle  it appears some unknown infiltrators had the audacity to try to break into your chambers.  Why they came or what they wanted is a secret they took to the grave.
column6: You're awakened in the night to the sounds of a scuffle  it appears some unknown infiltrators had the audacity to try to break into your chambers.  Why they came or what they wanted is a secret they took to the grave.

column2: Luckily he was caught before he could do any harm
column3: Heureusement, il a été capturé avant d'avoir pu nous nuire
column4: Luckily he was caught before he could do any harm
column6: Luckily he was caught before he could do any harm

column2: It seems the hiring policies for the guards around here have been a bit lax.  [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to plant a mole within your walls.
column3: Il sembleroit que la politique de recrutement des gardes se soit quelque peu relaschée par ici.  [From.GetTitledFirstName] a réussi à infiltrer une taupe dans vos murs.
column4: It seems the hiring policies for the guards around here have been a bit lax.  [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to plant a mole within your walls.
column6: It seems the hiring policies for the guards around here have been a bit lax.  [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to plant a mole within your walls.

column2: I've got a cell all prepared for you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3: J'ai un cachot qui n'attend que toi, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column4: I've got a cell all prepared for you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column6: I've got a cell all prepared for you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is dragged before you in chains.  His captors tell a captivating tale of a daring midnight infiltration, no doubt slightly embellished.  You have your prisoner, let the men have their tall tales
column3: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] est amené devant vous enchaisné. Ses ravisseurs narrent une histoire captivante d'une infiltration osée à minuit, sans nul doute légèrement embellie. Vous avez votre prisonnier, ils peuvent bien conter leur histoire
column4: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is dragged before you in chains.  His captors tell a captivating tale of a daring midnight infiltration, no doubt slightly embellished.  You have your prisoner, let the men have their tall tales
column6: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is dragged before you in chains.  His captors tell a captivating tale of a daring midnight infiltration, no doubt slightly embellished.  You have your prisoner, let the men have their tall tales

column2: We shall have to try again.
column3: Nous n'aurons qu'à essayer à nouveau.
column4: We shall have to try again.
column6: We shall have to try again.

column2: Your inside man lets the infiltrators through [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s gates, but they're discovered before they can grab [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] from [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] bed.  Fortunately, they were all killed in the ensuing scuffle, and there's no trace of your complicity
column3: Votre taupe laisse vos hommes passer les portes de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName], mais ils sont repérés avant de pouvoir l'enlever de sa couche. Heureusement, ils sont tous occis dans la bagarre qui s'ensuivit, et il n'y a nulle trace de votre complicité
column4: Your inside man lets the infiltrators through [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s gates, but they're discovered before they can grab [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] from [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] bed.  Fortunately, they were all killed in the ensuing scuffle, and there's no trace of your complicity
column6: Your inside man lets the infiltrators through [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s gates, but they're discovered before they can grab [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] from [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] bed.  Fortunately, they were all killed in the ensuing scuffle, and there's no trace of your complicity

column2: It's so hard to find good help these days
column3: Il est si difficile de trouver des gens compétents de nos jours
column4: It's so hard to find good help these days
column6: It's so hard to find good help these days

column2: Your inside man is unmasked by another of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s guards.  Under threat of torture he reveals your involvement.
column3: Votre taupe est démasquée par un aultre garde de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Sous la menace de torture, il révèle votre implication.
column4: Your inside man is unmasked by another of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s guards.  Under threat of torture he reveals your involvement.
column6: Your inside man is unmasked by another of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s guards.  Under threat of torture he reveals your involvement.

column2: Tonight may be the night. I spotted [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] going up to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] rooms alone after an eve of drinking. I doubt [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is in a condition to resist my charms, if I choose to follow.
column3: Tonight may be the night. I spotted [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] going up to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] rooms alone after an eve of drinking. I doubt [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is in a condition to resist my charms, if I choose to follow.

column4: It's now or never!
column6: It's now or never!

column2: I lack the courage...
column3: Je n'ai point assez de courage...
column4: I lack the courage...
column6: I lack the courage...

column2: I've observed the comings and going of the target of a particularly romantic plot, and think I can faciliate a private meeting for the two of them.
column3: J'ai observé les allées et venues de la cible d'une certaine intrigue amoureuse , et je songe pouvoir faciliter une rencontre en privé entre eulx deulx.
column4: I've observed the comings and going of the target of a particularly romantic plot, and think I can faciliate a private meeting for the two of them.

column2: It happened rather suddenly. One moment I was alone in my bed, and then the next [From.GetTitledFirstName] was there with me. I was about to cry for the guards, but the things [From.GetSheHe] he did... I did not want them to stop, and I have not wanted to since the night it happened. I cannot stop thinking about [From.GetHerHim].

column2: How did that happen? Was I drinking?

column4: How did that happen? Was I drinking?

column2: My attempts at seduction have failed! [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] not only threw me out of his room, but threatened to have the guards throw me out of the castle as well. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHeCap] is not pleased with me, and [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is not the only one.

I threw [From.GetHerHim] out in a rage, and threatened to call the guards if [From.GetSheHe] tried anything so outrageous again. The nerve of the [From.GetManWoman]!

column2: Denied!
column3: Refusé !
column4: Denied!
column6: Denied!

column2: The sharp decline of my power and territories have not gone unnoticed by other rulers. While I continue to insist on my claims to Imperial dignity, it is clear that my peers no longer take them seriously.
column3: La forte baisse de mon pouvoir et de mes territoires ne sont point passées inaperçues aulx yeulx des aultres souverains. Bien que je continue d'insister sur mes prétentions à la dignité impériale, il est clair que mes pairs ne me prennent plus au sérieulx.
column4: Der starke Rückgang meiner Macht und Territorien hat sich den anderen Herrscher nicht unbemerkt passiert. Während ich auf meinen Anspruch auf dem Kaisertum fortsetze, ist es klar, dass meine Kollegen mich nicht mehr ernst nehmen.
column6: The sharp decline of my power and territories have not gone unnoticed by other rulers. While I continue to insist on my claims to Imperial dignity, it is clear that my peers no longer take them seriously.

column2: But I *am* the [Root.GetTitle]!
column3: Mais je *suis* le [Root.GetTitle] !
column4: Aber ich *bin* der [Root.GetTitle]!
column6: But I *am* the [Root.GetTitle]!

column2: The change in crown authority has forced me to change some of my demesne laws.
column3: Le changement de l'autorité de la couronne m'a forcé à changer certaines de mes lois domaniales.
column4: Die Veränderung der Kronautorität hat mich gezwungen, einige meiner Herrschaftgesetze zu verändern.
column6: The change in crown authority has forced me to change some of my demesne laws.

column2: My changes to the crown authority of the Empire have now been fully implemented across the realm.
column3: Le changement d'autorité de la Couronne de l'Empire que j'ai désiré est désormais pleinement mis en uvre à travers le Royaume.
column4: Meine Änderungen der Krone-Autorität  sind jetzt im ganzen Reich durchgeführt worden.
column6: My changes to the crown authority of the Empire have now been fully implemented across the realm.

column2: This was not a just act!
column3: Ce n'estoit point un acte juste !
column4: Das war kein rechtmäßiger Akt!
column6: This was not a just act!

column2: Oh well
column3: Oh bien !
column4: Nun ja
column6: Oh well

column2: I have reclaimed the Byzantine Empire for the Orthodox faith. The title of Augustus is rightfully mine.
column3: J'ai repris l'Empire Byzantin au nom de la foi Orthodoxe. Le titre d'Augustus est mien de droit.
column4: I have reclaimed the Byzantine Empire for the Orthodox faith. The title of Augustus is rightfully mine.
column6: I have reclaimed the Byzantine Empire for the Orthodox faith. The title of Augustus is rightfully mine.

column2: Glorious day!
column3: Un jour glorieulx !
column4: Glorreicher Tag!
column6: Glorious day!

column2: Following a faith completely different from Catholicism, I cannot legitimately claim to be Latin Emperor.
column3: Étant donné que je suis une foi complètement différente du Catholicisme, je ne puis point me revendiquer comme Empereur Latin.
column4: Following a faith completely different from Catholicism, I cannot legitimately claim to be Latin Emperor.
column6: Following a faith completely different from Catholicism, I cannot legitimately claim to be Latin Emperor.

column2: Following a faith completely different from Orthodoxy, I cannot legitimately claim to be Byzantine Emperor.
column3: Étant donné que je suis une foi complètement différente de l'Orthodoxisme, je ne puis point me revendiquer comme Empereur Byzantin.
column4: Following a faith completely different from Orthodoxy, I cannot legitimately claim to be Byzantine Emperor.
column6: Following a faith completely different from Orthodoxy, I cannot legitimately claim to be Byzantine Emperor.

column2: The Crusade was a great success, but to whom shall I grant the lands I have gained?
column3: La Croisade fut un grand succès, mais à qui accorderois-je les terres que j'ai obtenu?
column4: Der Kreuzzug war ein großer Erfolg. An wen werde ich das neu erworbene Land geben?
column6: The Crusade was a great success, but to whom shall I grant the lands I have gained?

column2: To my son
column3: A mon fils
column4: An meinen Sohn
column6: To my son

column2: To a capable relative
column3: Pour un parent capable
column4: An einen tauglichen Verwandten
column6: To a capable relative

column2: To myself
column3: À moi-mesme
column4: An mich selbst
column6: To myself

column2: To my brother
column3: A mon frère
column4: An meinen Bruder
column6: To my brother

column2: To a valiant retainer
column3: À un preulx serviteur
column4: To a valiant retainer
column6: To a valiant retainer

column2: The Crusade was a great success and now I must decide whether to request a fief in the captured lands for one of my relatives.
column3: La Croisade fut fructueuse, je dois maintenant décider pour quel membre de ma famille je devrois demander un fief, en terre sainte.
column4: The Crusade was a great success and now I must decide whether to request a fief in the captured lands for one of my relatives.
column6: The Crusade was a great success and now I must decide whether to request a fief in the captured lands for one of my relatives.

column2: Request a fief for my son

column6: Request a fief for my son
